Package com.polytech.SocialBucket.Chat

Class EchoServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polytech.SocialBucket.Chat.EchoServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer
    public class EchoServer
extends Object
implements Observer
    This class overrides some of the methods in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the server.
    Version:
    July 2000
    Author:
    Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, Dr Robert Laganière, François Bélanger, Paul Holden

    • Field Summary

      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      The default port to listen on.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EchoServer

        public EchoServer​(int port,
                  ChatIF serverUI)
        Constructs an instance of the echo server.
        Parameters:
        port - The port number to connect on.
        serverUI - The interface type variable.

    • Method Detail

      • handleMessageFromClient

        public void handleMessageFromClient​(Object msg,
                                    ConnectionToClient client)
        This method handles any messages received from the client.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message received from the client.
        client - The connection from which the message originated.

      • clientConnected

        public void clientConnected​(ConnectionToClient client)
        This method is called when a client connects to the server. It overrides the method in the superclass.
        Parameters:
        client - the connected client.

      • clientDisconnected

        public void clientDisconnected​(ConnectionToClient client)
        This method is called when a client disconnects from the server. It overrides the method in the superclass.
        Parameters:
        client - the disconnected client.

      • clientException

        public void clientException​(ConnectionToClient client,
                            Throwable exception)
        This method is called each time an exception is thrown in a ConnectionToClient thread. It overrides the method in the superclass.
        Parameters:
        client - the client that raised the exception.
        exception - the exception thrown.

      • serverStarted

        protected void serverStarted()
        This method overrides the one in the superclass. Called when the server starts listening for connections.

      • serverStopped

        protected void serverStopped()
        This method overrides the one in the superclass. Called when the server stops listening for connections.

      • handleMessageFromServerUI

        public void handleMessageFromServerUI​(String message)
        Called when the server admin types something into the console. Sends the message to all clients.
        Parameters:
        message -

                   Object arg)
        Update method for the observer pattern
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
